name: Shut-In Angel (Gamejam-Version)
description:
CW: Suicide, Depression, Pills, Self-Harm, Disturbing Imagery

READ THE CONTENT WARNINGS ABOVE

Pari wakes up in heaven. They aren't quite ready to go outside yet. Maybe one day...

Made in 3 days for Mini Jam 119 on little to no sleep.

Theme : Heaven

Limitation: Everything can Die

CREDITS:

Belderchal - Everything

Box - Sketchbook illustrations

CONTROLS (Controller support is scuffed until I fix it, sorry! Keyboard only!)

Z, Spacebar, Enter = Confirm

LEFT, RIGHT, or A, D = Movement

[Alt + Enter], F11 = Fullscreen
